name: U.A.D.S. - Untitled Asteroid Defence Simulator
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Try to save the entire Earth's population from our planet's impending crash with a giant asteroid.

Rotate the Earth using A and D keys to find a place for your buildings. Remember: the space is limited!

Use the rocket launchers to push the asteroid back and get just a little bit of time.

Use the evacuation ships to evacuate as many people as you can.

Use the factories to produce money for your everyday expences... Like five or six rocket launchers.

Beware! Evacuate all the people as fast as you can because the Asteroid speeds up every second!

INSTRUCTIONS: 

A, D or Rotate Buttons on the screen - Rotate the Earth.

Use Button on the screen - Use the ability of the building currently selected

Place Building Buttons on the screen - Place specified building (from the top to bottom: Rocket Launcher, Factory, Evacuation Station)

Delete Button on the screen - Delete currently selected building for the 50% of it's original cost.

Double press Escape (the double press because the first press exits itch.io fullscreen, and only the second press is registered by the game) - Pause menu.
